name: Knots Champ
description:
Challenge online players in KNOTS CHAMP and win real cash prizes!

The goal is to connect matching dots with colored lines. Connect all the dots on each level to move onto the next one. Are you good at puzzle games? Test your skills against other players and become the KNOTS CHAMP!

▶ CASH PRIZES ◀
This special edition of KNOTS features the Skillz eSports Platform.
Play matches in practice mode for tokens, then switch to cash games when you're ready to compete and win!
Games can be played head-to-head against other players or in large, multiplayer tournaments.
All players in a match get the same levels in the same order, and the player who finishes with the most points wins!
Challenge people around the world and compete for trophies, leaderboards, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing!

▶ KEY FEATURES ◀
Connect the same-colored dots to complete a level. You score points for each two dots that you connect.
Each match consists of multiple levels. Complete all the levels before the timer expires to earn a time bonus and game completion bonus.
If you get stuck, a limited number of hints are available to help you get untangled.
The player with the most points wins the match!

▶ NOTES ◀
Cash tournaments are not available in all countries and are not enabled in the following U.S. states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, FL, LA, MD, MT, SC, SD, and TN.
If you don't live in a cash-enabled region, you can still enjoy the game with virtual currency.
If you have any questions about the game feel free to reach us at moga@ibexsolutions.net
If you have any questions about the Skillz Platform or real cash tournaments please contact support@skillz.com

So, do you have the Skillz for it? ;)
What are you waiting for? Download KNOTS CHAMP and start connecting the dots for real money NOW! Also, please rate us in the App Store!

Enjoy,
The KNOTS CHAMP Team
